contentrichtext.text: {{Mandaeism}} '''Qolusta''' ({{lang-mid|קולסתא}} ''{{transl|mid|Qōlutā}}'') is the canonical [[prayerbook]] of the [[Mandaeism|Mandaeans]], a present day [[gnostic]] sect within [[Iraq]] and [[Iran]]. It was translated into [[English language|English]] by [[E. S. Drower]]. ==External links== *[http://www.gnosis.org/library/ginzarba.htm Canonical Prayerbook] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20070324003136/http://www.geocities.commandaeanworld1/cpindex1.html A slightly more complete version] at the [[Internet Archive]] (the first few sections have not been archived) [[Category:Mandaean texts]] [[Category:Prayer]] [[Category:Religion in Iran]] [[Category:Religion in Iraq]] {{reli-stub}}
